Plot: The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.
Title: The Phantom
Actors: Billy Zane, Kristy Swanson, Treat Williams, Catherine Zeta-Jones
tomatoConsensus: The script gives Billy Zane little to work with, and thus he plays the Phantom as a friendly but completely one-dimensional hero.
